name: quickbooks
description: Updates Quickbooks with completed order details

services.name: persist
services.description: Import new order to a Quickbooks SalesReceipt or updates existing SalesReceipt.

parameters.name: ship_method_name
parameters.description: Mapping from Spree shipping methods to Quickbooks shipping method names

parameters.name: deposit_to_account_name
parameters.description: Quickbooks account name to book the SalesReceipt in.

parameters.name: payment_method_name
parameters.description: Mapping from Spree payment method names to Quickbooks payment method names

parameters.name: shipping_item
parameters.description: Quickbooks Item SKU to use for shipping line items

parameters.name: tax_item
parameters.description: Quickbooks Item SKU to use for tax line items

parameters.name: coupon_item
parameters.description: Quickbooks Item SKU to use for coupon line items

parameters.name: discount_item
parameters.description: Quickbooks Item SKU to use for discount line items

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: Quickbooks Income Account name for the items, defaults to 'Sales'

parameters.name: receipt_header_class_name
parameters.description: Quickbooks Class name for SalesReceipt, only supported by Quickbooks Desktop!
